metadata.title: CVE-2024-26952 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: fix potencial out-of-bounds when buffer offset is invalidI found potencial out-of-bounds when buffer offset fields of a few requestsis invalid. This patch set the minimum value of buffer offset field to->Buffer offset to validate buffer length.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
